Key Match Events: Pakistan brushed aside an understrength New Zealand aside in the second T20I of their series in Rawalpindi.
New Zealand were bowled out for 90, a chase that Pakistan hauled down with complete ease.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the eighth lowest total in a completed innings in men's T20Is for New Zealand.
Others: All of Pakistanâ€™s bowlers finished with excellent figures; none of them had economy rates above seven runs per over.
Shadab Khan picked up two wickets, including that of Ish Sodhi with an unusual lbw.
